alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 1:17PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of Collier, northern Mainland Monroe, southeastern Hendry, northern Broward and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 200 PM EST... At 116 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 8 miles south of Devils Garden to 10 miles east of Golden Gate Estates to near Marco Island. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marco Island, Chokoloskee, Ave Maria, Everglades City, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Plantation Island, Carnestown, Cape Romano, Belle Meade, Lely Resort, Copeland, Wilderness Waterway, Hendry Correctional, Big Cypress National Preserve, Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Royal Palm Hammock, Marco Island Airport, Naples Manor and Miccosukee Service Plaza. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County; Mainland Monroe
